name: Atelier Dusk Trilogy Deluxe Pack: Limited Premium Box Set
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Atelier Ayesha: The Alchemist of Dusk DX,
Game: Atelier Escha & Logy: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky DX,
Game: Atelier Shallie: Alchemists of the Dusk Sea DX,
World of Dusk Lore Book,
World of Dusk Music CD,
World of Dusk Postcard Set (10 postcards)
